title: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei (Sayonara, Zetsubou-Sensei)
synopsis: Nozomu Itoshiki is a high school teacher so pessimistic that even the smallest of misfortunes can send him into a pit of raging despair; some of these "catastrophes" even lead to suicide attempts.
related_anime: ['Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei Jo: Zetsubou Shoujo Senshuu', 'Zoku Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei', 'Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei Special', 'Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei']
